Biomass Management

Composting and biomass management of crop residues and/or manure are fundamental for nutrient and water-holding capacity and a healthy soil life.

See here an excellent animated video about proper biomass management and composting and learn about the benefits and on how to do it. cat videourl




See here a real-life farm video on how to build a good compost pile and how to use the biomass available on a farm.
